title: Analyze Contract for Termination Clause
description: A client wants to terminate a contract, and an attorney needs to analyze the agreement to understand their rights and any penalties.

tasks.description: Locate and review the 'Term and Termination' section of the contract.
Identify the conditions under which the client can terminate the contract (e.g., 'termination for convenience', 'termination for cause').
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies the applicable termination rights.

tasks.description: Determine any notice periods or early termination fees that apply.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds that a 60-day written notice is required.

tasks.description: Draft a memo to the client summarizing their termination rights and obligations under the contract.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides clear legal advice to the client.
